moduleID.description: Define module ID, sub module ID

numOfRegionsHorizontal.description: Number of Horizontal Regions for AEC stats grid

numOfRegionsVertical.description: Number of Vertical Regions for AEC stats grid

enableStatsQuadSync.description: Flag to enable bayer pixel Quad sync for saturated stats handling. Enabling will synchronize saturation decision for each pixel quad

enableSaturatedStats.description: Flag to enable Saturated Stats output. Enabling this will give more information on saturated pixels with bigger stats output buffer size. Disable if power is of higher concern.

enableYComputedStats.description: Flag to enable Luma stats to be computed from color channels into single Channel Stats

YComputationColorWeight.description: RGB channel weight for computing Y luma for HW stats. If enableYComputedStats is set to true, these values will be used to compute Y value

HWStatsSkipFactor.description: Specify HW grid skipping pattern based on power and accuracy trade-off. value of X means keeping 1 grid every 2^X grid. value of zero means no skipping. Maximum supported value is 2

ROIConfigControl.description: Select ROI configuration type. AECROIConfigControlTypeCroppedFOV means follow Zoomed FOV; AECROIConfigControlTypeFullFOV means use Full FOV from Sensor. Default value: AECROIConfigControlTypeCroppedFOV
